text: (anta nāḷiṉ) vētaṉaiyaik kāṇumpōtukaḷrrkaḷṟa aniyāyam ceyta ovvōr ātmāvum, ataṉiṭam ulakattiluḷḷa poruṭkaḷ ellāmē iruntiruntālum avai aṉaittaiyumē (taṉakkup) parikāramākak koṭuttuviṭa nāṭum; taṉ kaicētattaiyum, kaḻivirakkattaiyum veḷippaṭuttum; āṉāl (annāḷil) avaiyiṭaiyē niyāyamākavē tīrppaḷikkappaṭum - (oru ciṟitum) avaṟṟukku aniyāyam ceyyappaṭa māṭṭātu
